products.title: Roma Grey Nickel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be pulled aside or tilted with ease. Offset the grey nickel with sunny yellows, fruity limes, or bright oranges to create a trendy and charming colour scheme. Use these striking colour combinations in a bright home office, a relaxing dining room, or a welcoming spare bedroom.

products.title: Roma Monza - Vertical Blind
products.description: An effective filter blind, the roma monza gently filters light whilst avoiding dimming out the room completely. Red never goes out of style, being the go-to colour for bold and contemporary looks, so this blind will last through the years, regardless of trends. The strong, striking hue used in the monza will make the perfect window feature for an all-white dining room or grey and charcoal living room.

products.title: Roma Athens Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends itself to a coordinating charcoal and dove grey colour scheme, ideal for a home office; or to a palette of deep forest greens and pale greys in the den, complemented by medium, polished woods.

products.title: Roma Bronco - Vertical Blind
products.description: For natural charm, choose the roma in bronco, a medium taupe fabric with a neat, tightly woven fabric, and excellent light-filtering properties, letting the light through at will, whether open or closed. Select the bronco for a strikingly neutral home office, where you can pair it with pale beiges and soft creams. Or instead, add a tempering shade to a dark brown living room, where you can snuggle up after a long night, and where cosiness and warmth are the words of the day.

products.title: Richmond Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The richmond cameo features a barely-there white base adorned with an array of lightly stitched, feathery curves in the same hue. Its louvres are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy, and hang neatly from their rails. Use the cameo in the bathroom, where privacy is key, and clean, fresh colours look their best. Add a soft aqua or duck egg to provide quick bursts of colour, using the hue for towels, bath mats, and wall art.

products.title: Roma Rodeo Dust - Vertical Blind
products.description: A contemporary, beige filter blind, the roma in rodeo dust mixes a soft tan hue with a smooth, tightly woven fabric for a modern and streamlined look. Wherever you choose to place this blind, it will add a natural class to the room around it. Pair the rodeo dust with forest greens for an outdoorsy atmosphere in the living room, where this unusual and striking colour scheme will create an unforgettable aesthetic.

products.title: Roma Natural - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

products.title: Rochester Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The clean white of the cameo, from the arch-patterned rochester range, will work in almost any setting. The heavy curves of the patterning are streamlined and fresh, working wonderfully with the straight lines of the vertically hanging louvres. Use the cameo to add soft texture to an all-white kitchen, plumping for sleek, contemporary white units and glossy tiles. Include furniture in light to medium woods, or even modern whites, and choose silver for the fixtures, fittings, and oddments.

products.title: Richmond Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

products.title: Decor Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

products.title: Henderson Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

products.title: Rochester Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a sophisticated window dressing, opt for the elegant rochester in cream, where fine, silky threads shape a quality and beneficial blind with a captivating texture. This exquisite cloth, with both beauty and grace, hangs on adjustable louvres that allow you to alter the amount of light entering the room. Generate an elegant boudoir by including the dreamy texture of the cream amongst alike, opulent fabrics with similar shimmer and style.

products.title: Rochester Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

products.title: Roma Gallery - Vertical Blind
products.description: Calm and collected, the roma gallery's pale cream hue will set off bolder colours with ease, making it both a pretty and useful window feature. The pale colour shows off the supple, cotton-like fabric that is finely woven yet highly durable. Construct a serene, peaceful environment by using the gallery as the key colour rather than a complementary one, and place against matching cream walls and soft furnishings, with light woods working effectively as an accent; a look that will work beautifully in a master bedroom or living room.

products.title: Henderson Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The antique-style stripes of the henderson are this time in the soothing off-white of the cameo, with alternate stitching patterns forming the striping pattern, which complements the clean lines of the modern louvres. Choose the cameo as part of the nursery, where the sweet stripes will add interest to the room without complicating the decor. Match with a soft lemon yellow for a soothing palette to encourage calm and tranquility, whilst still giving off a happy and cheery vibe.

products.title: Roma Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

products.title: Henderson Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accentuating that of the stripes. For a luxe and classic look in the master bedroom, settle the cream against matching cream walls and furnish with dark, polished woods to give a contrasting effect.

products.title: Richmond Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet sturdy enough to hang neatly in louvres, this is a blind with both practical and stylish qualities. Team the cream with a bolder hue for maximum impact, choosing a deep maroon or burgundy for a grand look in the dining room.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in ths modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Zorro 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Vitra blackout is one of their most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. Revamp your home or office space with a stunning vitra blackout zorro vertical blind in a beautiful browncolour. Product id: sdb-vtb0687 fabric colour: zorro material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes vitra blackout zorro 89mm vertical blind in brown.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This sunburst yellow blackout vertical blind adds a invigorating splash of colour to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new yellow blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this bright yellow vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Voile Fr Ll Brilliant White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: These beautiful flame retardant translucent fabrics are available in a range of natural colours. This translucent white vertical blind allows the light to filter while retaining privacy and is hand-washable. This pollergen-coated fabric means this fabric is an anti-allergy material, great for windows near a garden.
